message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Bullish tilt into close with strong momentum in select PSUs and financials. Standouts: LTF, ABCAPITAL, INDUSTOWER, BSE, NBCC, HUDCO, FORTIS; KPITTECH rebounded. Metals steady with HINDCOPPER attempting breakout; ASHOKLEY consolidated near range low. Prefer breakout-or-dip-to-support entries; avoid chasing extended candles.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Momentum long on breakout/dips", "reason": "Closed near day high with strong volume; trend intact. Buy >259.5 or pullback to 252–254 with tight risk.", "price": 259.5},
    {"symbol": "ABCAPITAL", "signal": "Breakout watch >301.60", "reason": "Strong close at resistance; sustained push above 301.6 can extend uptrend.", "price": 301.6},
    {"symbol": "NHPC", "signal": "Continuation buy >87.00", "reason": "PSU power bid persists; tight base and high-volume closes near highs.", "price": 87.0},
    {"symbol": "GAIL", "signal": "Breakout watch >176.80", "reason": "Uptrend with closes near highs; confirmation above resistance zone 176.8–177.5.", "price": 176.8},
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "signal": "Breakout entry >110.10", "reason": "PSU EPC strength; closing near range high with volume; clean trigger above 110.1.", "price": 110.1},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "High-base breakout >353.00", "reason": "Series of higher lows; closing strength; watch for range expansion above 353.", "price": 353.0},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Add on strength >340 or buy dips 328–330", "reason": "Attempted breakout, strong sector tone; manage risk given volatility.", "price": 340.0},
    {"symbol": "ASHOKLEY", "signal": "Range trade; add only on breakout >143.80", "reason": "Defended 140.8 low; needs range exit to resume momentum.", "price": 143.8},
    {"symbol": "FORTIS", "signal": "Follow-through >996.90/1000", "reason": "Closed near highs; round-number resistance just ahead.", "price": 996.9},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Fresh-high continuation >2085", "reason": "Tight, strong close; watch for sustained prints over prior high.", "price": 2085.0},
    {"symbol": "KPITTECH", "signal": "Re-entry above 1163.30 or buy pullback 1135–1140", "reason": "Reclaimed momentum after prior selloff; confirmation over day high improves odds.", "price": 1163.3},
    {"symbol": "WAAREEENER", "signal": "Breakout watch >3360", "reason": "Leader in renewables; base breakout level nearby.", "price": 3360.0},
    {"symbol": "UNIONBANK", "signal": "Buy-the-dip zone 136.5–137.5", "reason": "PSU banks show leadership; constructive consolidation above support.", "price": 137.5},
    {"symbol": "HUDCO", "signal": "Breakout watch >235.24", "reason": "Closing strength with PSU tailwind; trigger above day high.", "price": 235.24},
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Confirmation on close >1480", "reason": "Bounce from support; needs higher-high close to confirm reversal.", "price": 1480.0}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "NBCC", "action": "Buy", "reason": "PSU momentum + near-range breakout; only if price triggers above day high to avoid chop.", "quantity": 35, "price": "Buy stop-limit 110.30/110.70; SL 105.90; T1 112.80, T2 116.50"}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 4140.0,
    "total_value": 25761.6,
    "holdings_count": 2,
    "holdings": [
      "ASHOKLEY: 70 units @ 142.00, LTP 141.23, Value 9886.10",
      "HINDCOPPER: 35 units @ 312.00, LTP 335.30, Value 11735.50"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Holdings: HINDCOPPER—keep holding; add only on strength >340 or pullback 328–330 with SL ~322. ASHOKLEY—support 140.8; add only on breakout >143.8 with volume.",
    "PSU/power: NHPC and GAIL constructive; triggers posted. SJVN steady; consider only on strength >91.3.",
    "PSU banks: UNIONBANK dip-buys favored; INDIANB momentum intact but extended—prefer fresh adds only on strength >750.",
    "Financials: LTF, ABCAPITAL show leadership—focus on breakout or controlled dip entries; SBICARD improving but needs >883 for cleaner structure.",
    "Hospitals: FORTIS strong; MAXHEALTH softer; APOLLOHOSP range-bound—prefer names closing near highs.",
    "IT/ER&D: KPITTECH regained momentum; COFORGE firm; wait for confirmed breakouts in PERSISTENT/TATAELXSI before entries.",
    "Renewables: WAAREEENER leading; INOXWIND and KPIGREEN constructive but secondary—trade only on strength.",
    "Defence/shipyards: GRSE volatile off highs; HAL resilient; BEML firm—prefer strength above respective day highs.",
    "Realty: PRESTIGE/OBEROI constructive; look for tight consolidations before entries.",
    "High-turnover names: IDEA exhibited very heavy volume—avoid unless it bases and reclaims 8.6 with follow-through.",
    "Risk plan: With small portfolio, keep per-trade risk ≤2% (~₹500). Use stop-losses at posted levels and avoid chasing gaps above triggers.",
    "Execution note: If NBCC gaps above 111.5, skip the emergency trade and reassess Monday; prefer planned triggers over impulsive fills."
  ]
}
